reviewText: Enjoyed every bit of it. Being it was filmed with 1985 technology, it is better quality than I expected.
Video quality is in line with the technology available at the time. But it was a great game. I'll pull it out every few years to watch before the Final Four.
Get a video camera, and on a sunny day take your dog out in the yard and show the sun shining on his ass. Because that is the equivalent of the Villanova win.
got this for my father in law who was an alumni and he really enjoyed reliving the moment...great piece of history although i must say it was a bit pricey....
